name: Artists of a Dead World
description:
This is my game for the Haunted PS1 Madvent Calendar! Go check that out! However, you can download this game separately here if you would like! (Also play the Mac or Linux versions)

This is a short "walking-sim" type game about a city at the end of a ruined world. Playtime is 5-10 minutes. WASD to walk, space to jump, shift to run, and mouse to look, plus escape to open sensitivity option.

There are a few secrets and tough-to-find endings. Can you find them? Take a look! Good night!

Using the HPSXRP.
